ingredients: 1 (15 oz) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup pico de gallo (or diced tomatoes with onions and cilantro)
1/2 red onion, thinly sliced and pickled in lime juice
Chipotle crema: 1/3 cup sour cream or Greek yogurt mixed with 1-2 tsp adobo sauce and 1 Tbsp lime juice
steps: Divide cilantro-lime rice among serving bowls
Top with sliced carne asada (or chosen protein), black beans, and charred corn
Add pico de gallo, avocado/guacamole, pickled red onions, and pickled jalapeños
Garnish with fresh cilantro, drizzle with chipotle crema, and serve with lime wedges
title: Carne Asada Bowl
